name: connection(_:didSendBodyData:totalBytesWritten:totalBytesExpectedToWrite:)
desc: Sent as the body (message data) of a request is transmitted (such as in an HTTP POST request).
declaration:
optional func connection(_ connection: NSURLConnection, 
         didSendBodyData bytesWritten: Int, 
       totalBytesWritten: Int, 
totalBytesExpectedToWrite: Int)
